## AdvancedMetadataSelectorComponent.dragOverSplit() method

Event handler used for handling drag over

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
dragOverSplit(event: DragEvent, index: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  event | <code>DragEvent</code> | Event for dragging |
|  index | <code>number</code> | Index of split span |
